price: 83. Kaadu A- Nabiyow cus Ni-naqsi Nabii Ayyuub isi Rabbih seceeh, kaliace waqdi, diggah biyak kee gibdaabini yoo geeh, atu nacror leemik nacrooruh Yayse Rabbi kinnito axcuk.
arabic: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-ḍuru wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
